title: Cross-Validation with Linear Models
description: In this lab, we will be using cross-validation with linear models. We will be using the diabetes dataset and applying GridSearchCV to find the best alpha value for Lasso regression. We will then plot the errors and use LassoCV to see how much we can trust the selection of alpha.

meta.title: Cross-Validation with Linear Models | Diabetes Dataset | Lasso Regression
meta.description: Learn how to use cross-validation with linear models, apply GridSearchCV to find the best alpha value for Lasso regression, and plot the errors using the diabetes dataset.
meta.keywords: cross-validation, linear models, diabetes dataset, Lasso regression, GridSearchCV
